name: R&Dy
description:
Little Alchemy meets Factorio in this genre-bending relaxing collectathon sandbox!

- Combine mechanics, make genres!

- Mix genres with ideas to make all of your favorite indie videogames!

- 90 recipes to discover!

- 84 games to discover!

- 18 genres to discover!

- 8 structures to master!

- Unlimited factory possibilities!

Game jam notes:

As you unlock more items, you will have exponential crafting possibilities!

Assets used: 

Fonts:

- 04B_03

- joystix monospace

- ThaleahFat

- UpheavelPro

Sound FX:

- Some various sound effects from the Ultimate SFX Bundle (HD Remaster)

(Made for the Big Festive Game Jam 2022)
